name: Superior_Attuned_Superior_Command_of_the_Mastermind_F
display_name: Superior Attuned Superior Command of the Mastermind F
display_fullname: Boosts.Superior Attuned Command of the Mastermind F
display_help: UNIQUE -- No more than 1 enhancement of this type may be slotted by a character. Gives the Mastermind an aura that boosts the Area of Effect Defense of nearby henchmen and reduces recharge time by {Boost.Attrib.RechargeTime.Scale}%. This enhancement can only be slotted in a Mastermind pet power.
display_short_help: Set: Superior Command of the Mastermind
power_display_names: Superior Command of the Mastermind: Recharge/Pet +AoE Defense Aura
power_short_helps: Increases Attack Rate, Pet +AoE Defense Aura
